imdb.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender
imdb.plot: Five teenagers become the last line of defense for the galaxy in an intergalactic battle against the evil alien force led by King Zarkon.

episodes.title: Launch Date
episodes.plot: The Paladins spend one last night on Earth in preparation for the launch of the Atlas. Lance works up the courage to ask Allura an important question.

episodes.title: Shadows
episodes.plot: Flashbacks shine a light on Honerva's past with Lotor and Zarkon, revealing the motivation for her recent actions.

episodes.title: The Prisoner's Dilemma
episodes.plot: After taking control of a Galra base on a dark planet, the Paladins follow a distress signal from a missing fleet and make an unsettling discovery.

episodes.title: Battle Scars
episodes.plot: While floating through the universe searching for signs of a Robeast, the Paladins head toward Olkarion and realize they aren't alone on their journey.

episodes.title: The Grudge
episodes.plot: The Paladins make plans to meet with the Atlas, but the reunion is interrupted when the Lions are ambushed by a mysterious adversary.

episodes.title: Genesis
episodes.plot: Voltron heads to Oriande to confront Honerva after the team discovers she's using wormholes to harvest massive amounts of Quintessence.

episodes.title: Day Forty Seven
episodes.plot: Pilots Kinkade and Rizavi provide a documentary-style look at both the lighthearted and stressful moments of day-to-day life on the Atlas.

episodes.title: Clear Day
episodes.plot: The crew heads to the planet Drazan to participate in the festivities of Clear Day, but Allura is plagued by nightmares when she stays behind to rest.

episodes.title: Knights of Light, Part 1
episodes.plot: The Paladins must travel deep into Allura's mind, and encounter frightening visions along the way.

episodes.title: Knights of Light, Part 2
episodes.plot: As they plumb the depths of Honerva's mind, the Paladins face reality-altering challenges.

episodes.title: Uncharted Regions
episodes.plot: As Honerva gets closer to creating a catastrophic rift in reality, the Atlas crew races against time to figure out how to locate and stop her.

episodes.title: The Zenith
episodes.plot: Confronted by a dark energy like nothing they've faced before, the Paladins must draw on their everlasting bond - and a few Balmera - to forge ahead.

episodes.title: The End Is the Beginning
episodes.plot: Voltron and Honerva come together at the source of all realities in the ultimate battle between good and evil for the survival of the universe.

episodes.title: A Little Adventure
episodes.plot: Part of the group gets stuck on a planet where they're inadvertently miniaturized. Flashbacks reveal the beginnings of Keith and Shiro's relationship.

episodes.title: The Road Home
episodes.plot: The Paladins stop at a base that belongs to the Blades, only to find it's been abandoned. But they come under attack before they can investigate.

episodes.title: The Way Forward
episodes.plot: Stuck in a perilous situation far from home and needing help to get free, the Paladins realize their fate is in Coran's hands.

episodes.title: The Feud!
episodes.plot: The Paladins inexplicably become contestants on the crazy game show "Garfle Warfle Snick." But they're playing for much more than cash and prizes.

episodes.title: The Ruins
episodes.plot: When Pidge intercepts a distress signal that the Paladins believe they recognize, the team ends up on a ruined planet that was ravaged by war.

episodes.title: The Journey Within
episodes.plot: As the Paladins hurtle through space, they enter a seemingly endless void that tests their sanity and their loyalty to one another.

episodes.title: The Last Stand, Part 1
episodes.plot: The Paladins receive a distress signal that's explained through a flashback to Pidge's father Sam's return to Earth four years earlier.

episodes.title: The Last Stand, Part 2
episodes.plot: Sam and the others at the Garrison attempt to hold off the Galra attacks in hopes that a desperate plea for help will reach Voltron.

episodes.title: Know Your Enemy
episodes.plot: The Team, realizing Earth have been overtaken by Galra Forces, figures out how to hide their lions and head to earth without them. When there they meet up with old friends and family and start working on a plan to take Sendak down.

episodes.title: Heart of the Lion
episodes.plot: The Paladins work with the Garrison pilots on a mission that could provide more clues about how to take down Sendak's operation.

episodes.title: Trial by Fire
episodes.plot: Sanda's revelation shakes the Paladins, who are separated from the Lions. On Earth, Shiro, Sam and Coran attempt to get the Atlas powered up.

episodes.title: Lions' Pride, Part 1
episodes.plot: When Voltron run into trouble, Shiro goes on a solo mission to defeat Sendak once and for all.

episodes.title: Lions' Pride, Part 2
episodes.plot: With the future of Earth hanging in the balance, Voltron and the others come together to face a mysterious enemy unlike any they've ever seen.

episodes.title: Omega Shield
episodes.plot: An attack by Sendak prompts the Paladins to scramble to a planet's defense. Lotor calls on Allura for help in assembling a powerful ship.

episodes.title: Razor's Edge
episodes.plot: Keith's journey to an abyss to search for a quintessence source unlocks memories about his past. Lance wallows in unrequited love.

episodes.title: Monsters & Mana
episodes.plot: When the team takes a break to play a magical role-playing game, their fantasy world sparks useful ideas to help them solve real-world problems.

episodes.title: The Colony
episodes.plot: After Lotor and Allura head off in the new ship, the remaining Paladins get a dire warning that could change everything.

episodes.title: The Black Paladins
episodes.plot: As one Paladin takes on a dangerous mission through a wormhole, the others contend with failing controls on the castle.

episodes.title: All Good Things
episodes.plot: A metaphysical encounter shines light on a Paladin's fate. Lance and Allura console each other about their past judgments. Lotor makes a plea.

episodes.title: Defender of All Universes
episodes.plot: An epic battle leaves the universe in a state of chaos, threatening to destroy all life unless a sacrifice is made.

episodes.title: The Prisoner
episodes.plot: After a daring mission at a key Galra outpost, the team considers a risky alliance. One Paladin leads a journey to retrieve an important prisoner.

episodes.title: Blood Duel
episodes.plot: Faced with a painful decision, the Paladins reluctantly come to an agreement with Zarkon. Haggar comes to grips with memories from the past.

episodes.title: Postmortem
episodes.plot: A power struggle erupts within the Galra. As the Paladins argue over their next move, an attack forces them to save themselves and the Olkari.

episodes.title: Kral Zera
episodes.plot: Shiro acts against the wishes of the other Paladins. Powerful Galra from around the empire convene for the Kral Zera ceremony.

episodes.title: Bloodlines
episodes.plot: Keith is sent to find a fellow Blade named Krolia and locate a powerful weapon. Lance, Hunk and Pidge reprogram a robot to have fun.

episodes.title: White Lion
episodes.plot: The team searches for a portal to a mysterious, fabled Altean land called Oriande. Shiro starts to feel like there's something wrong with him.

episodes.title: Code of Honor
episodes.plot: Keiths divided attentions cause tension within the team at a time when unity is crucial. The Blades investigate a Galra supply route.

episodes.title: Reunion
episodes.plot: Pidge gets information that prompts her to embark on an important solo mission to the far reaches of the universe.

episodes.title: Black Site
episodes.plot: An internal struggle for power erupts within the Galra. Pidge returns to the castle with some precious cargo.

episodes.title: The Voltron Show!
episodes.plot: Coran gets carried away with turning the Paladins into intergalactic stars when he designs an elaborate, effects-filled live tour of the universe.

episodes.title: Begin the Blitz
episodes.plot: Team Voltron devises a plan to continue the coalition's momentum and take control of more Galra territory. Lotor makes a big move.

episodes.title: A New Defender
episodes.plot: Forces of good and evil converge on the planet Naxzela, where Voltron faces unforeseen danger only one Paladin can help them escape.

episodes.title: Changing of the Guard
episodes.plot: As the Paladins work to build a coalition of rebels, Allura makes a suggestion that rattles the team. A new face aims to gain power with the Galra.

episodes.title: Red Paladin
episodes.plot: Lotor's forces move to retake the planet Puig and lure the Paladins out for a fight. Keith and Lance struggle to adjust to big changes.

episodes.title: The Hunted
episodes.plot: Keith's reckless choice leads the team into a dangerous situation, and Allura needs to channel one of the Paladins to get out of trouble.

episodes.title: Hole in the Sky
episodes.plot: The castle receives a distress signal that leads Allura and Coran to believe that they may not be the only surviving Alteans.

episodes.title: The Journey
episodes.plot: A pair of skeptical rebel fighters make things difficult for a Paladin in need of assistance. Haggar steps up her monitoring of Lotor.

episodes.title: Tailing a Comet
episodes.plot: As the Paladins pursue the comet, they become confused by Lotor's actions. Keith doubts his leadership skills, while Lance ponders his future.

episodes.title: The Legend Begins
episodes.plot: As the team tries to decipher Lotor's plan for the comet, Coran gives the Paladins a history lesson about the origins of Voltron and the ongoing war.

episodes.title: Across the Universe
episodes.plot: The lions get separated when a trip through a wormhole goes awry, while Coran and Allura scramble to break free of a seemingly endless time loop.

episodes.title: The Depths
episodes.plot: Hunk and Lance crash-land underwater and follow a mermaid to a civilization whose queen promises to keep them safe and help find the others.

episodes.title: Shiro's Escape
episodes.plot: After being saved from a dangerous situation by an unexpected ally, Shiro urges the rest of the team to trust his rescuer.

episodes.title: Greening the Cube
episodes.plot: While making repairs to the castle, the Paladins encounter unusual spongy spores that lead them to a planet of brilliant engineers.

episodes.title: Eye of the Storm
episodes.plot: Exhausted after a battle, the crew must spring back into action when Zarkon's forces track them down. Coran gets infected by a slippery virus.

episodes.title: The Ark of Taujeer
episodes.plot: Four of the Paladins head to a ravage planet called Taujeer to help the citizens escape, while Allura and Keith go off on a separate mission.

episodes.title: Space Mall
episodes.plot: Shiro attempts to create a deeper bond with the Black Lion, while Coran takes the others to a swap meet, where they have some strange adventures.

episodes.title: The Blade of Marmora
episodes.plot: Keith and Shiro travel to a hard-to-find base in an effort to align with the Blade of Marmora. Keith must fight to unlock the truth about his past.

episodes.title: The Belly of the Weblum
episodes.plot: The Paladins split up to gather resources for a showdown with Zarkon. Hunk and Keith travel into the belly of a planet-devouring creature.

episodes.title: Escape from Beta Traz
episodes.plot: Lance, Pidge and Shiro infiltrate a facility to free a prisoner of the Galra, but Lance and Shiro each think they've found the right inmate.

episodes.title: Stayin' Alive
episodes.plot: Allura travels to the Balmera to acquire a powerful crystal, but a visit from an evil beast prompts her to call on the Paladins for help.

episodes.title: Best Laid Plans
episodes.plot: After acquiring the teludav from the Olkari, the team prepares to launch the operation to defeat Zarkon and bring peace to the universe.

episodes.title: Blackout
episodes.plot: The Paladins fight an epic battle against the most powerful enemy they've ever faced, with the fate of the universe at stake.

episodes.title: The Rise of Voltron
episodes.plot: Overwhelmed but ready for action, five aspiring space explorers learn they have the power to create Voltron, the most powerful robot in the universe.

episodes.title: Some Assembly Required
episodes.plot: Princess Allura puts the Paladins through training when they start to lose their focus. They'll need to cooperate to learn to form Voltron.

episodes.title: Return of the Gladiator
episodes.plot: Shiro must draw on painful memories from his past when a massive evil robot threatens the peace in Arus, forcing the lions into action.

episodes.title: The Fall of the Castle of Lions
episodes.plot: As one Paladin threatens to leave the team, invaders storm the castle and destroy its power crystal in an attempt to steal Voltron.

episodes.title: Tears of the Balmera
episodes.plot: Hunk and Coran try to retrieve a new crystal from the Balmera while the rest of the team work to prevent Sendak from leaving the castle with Voltron.

episodes.title: Taking Flight
episodes.plot: The paladins leave Altea and embark for Balmera to fulfill Hunk's promise to Shay. En route, however, a distress signal waylays the crew when they go to investigate the signal's source.

episodes.title: Return to the Balmera
episodes.plot: Allura, Coran and the Paladins return to the Balmera to free the natives, but the arrival of a Galra ship could force Voltron into action.

episodes.title: Rebirth
episodes.plot: As the Paladins scramble to ward off a Galra monster, Allura hopes that her ancient powers can heal the Balmera and save its people.

episodes.title: Crystal Venom
episodes.plot: Allura considers making a heartbreaking sacrifice to save the team when the castle mysteriously turns on them and seems them hurtling toward doom.

episodes.title: Collection and Extraction
episodes.plot: The team stops at an isolated and seemingly insignificant Galra space station and discovers how the empire is gathering its energy from the universe.

episodes.title: The Black Paladin
episodes.plot: Zarkon lures Voltron into battle on his ship, and when one of the lions is captured the team must get creative to defeat the Galra and return home.
